Interface IApplicationServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationController
public interface IApplicationServices
Defines application‐management services for various roles:
  • Adding and removing applications
  • Retrieving successful applications for officers
  • Retrieving an applicant’s own applications
  • Retrieving booked, pending, and cancelling applications for managers
Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

    Retrieves all applications with status BOOKED for the given set of projects.

  • Method Details

    • addApplication

      void addApplication(Application app)
      Adds a new application to the system.
      Parameters:
      app - the Application object to add

    • removeApplication

      void removeApplication(int id)
      Removes an existing application from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the application to remove

    • officerGetSuccessfulApplication

      Map<Integer,Application> officerGetSuccessfulApplication(Officer officer)
      Retrieves all successfully booked applications assigned to a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - the Officer whose successful applications to retrieve
      Returns:
      map of application IDs to Application objects that are booked for that officer

    • ApplicantGetOwnApplication

      Map<Integer,Application> ApplicantGetOwnApplication(Applicant applicant)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the Applicant whose applications to fetch
      Returns:
      map of application IDs to Application objects belonging to that applicant

    • getProjectsBookedApplications

      Map<Integer,Application> getProjectsBookedApplications(Map<String,Project> projects)
      Retrieves all applications with status BOOKED for the given set of projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - map of project names to Project objects
      Returns:
      map of application IDs to booked Application objects in those projects

    • ManagerGetPendingApplications

      Map<Integer,Application> ManagerGetPendingApplications(Map<String,Project> projects)
      Retrieves all pending applications across a manager’s projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - map of project names to Project objects managed by the manager
      Returns:
      map of application IDs to Application objects with status PENDING

    • ManagerGetCancellingApplications

      Map<Integer,Application> ManagerGetCancellingApplications(Map<String,Project> projects)
      Retrieves all applications currently in cancellation process for a manager’s projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - map of project names to Project objects managed by the manager
      Returns:
      map of application IDs to Application objects with status PENDING_CANCEL or PENDING_CANCEL_BOOKING
